resources.string: There are no books in this Bookshelf. Please add some using the menu at the bottom of this screen.
You have not created any bookshelves yet. Please add some using the menu at the bottom of this screen.
The book you are trying to add already exists. Skipping.
The scanned book was not found. Please enter the details manually.
Unable to Connect to Google Books

Warning. Importing data may update existing book records with new information if the id in the import file is the same as an existing id. This is usually fine if you changed a field in an exported file. If you created a new book record, ensure the id field is blank.
ERROR: Export (to SDCard) of data failed.
ERROR: Import of data (from SDCard) failed. Is the file in the correct place?
To scan your books via the ISBN barcode, you must install the zxing barcode scanner application. Press OK to install, or Cancel to skip.
If you would like to support the development of this application, please donate using a my Amazon Wishlist or the paypal button below. Being in Australia means I cannot publish a "paid" version. :-)
This book has been loaned to:
Do you want to overwrite all existing thumbnails. Warning, this may take a long time.
Thumbnails are being downloaded in the background
Searching for the book failed. Please check your network settings.
Full online application help will come soon.
Selected fields are visible in the add/edit book screens. Unselected fields are hidden.
All stories in this anthology are written by the same author
Please confirm that these anthology titles are (mostly) correct

Book Catalogue is exactly what it sounds like; a simple application that allows you to create a list of all your books. Books can be added either manually, by ISBN, or by barcode. This is an open source android application - for more information please visit
The bulk of this screen lists your entire book collection. By default your books will be sorted by Author. If you click on the
icon it will expand to display all books for that author. You can change the sort order by selecting
from the menu, which will provide 4 options; sort by author, title, series and loaned.
When you quit, Book Catalogue will remember all your current settings, including how it is sorted, current bookshelf, and which book you are focused on.
Other display options under menu include
which will expand all authors (or series / loans depending on your sort setting). This option is not available when sorting by title.
If you long click on a book title (not author title) it will bring up a context menu which will allow you to delete a book or open/edit a book at a specific tab.
At the top of the main screen is the bookshelf selector.
This will tell you which bookshelf you are currently viewing and, if you click on it, allow you to change the current bookshelf.
There is a special bookshelf called “All Books” which allows you to display all books in the database regardless of the bookshelf they are in.
